steps: step 2: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login --> navigate to Page_home
step 3: At Page_home click on hyperlink_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 4: At Page_project click on button_object --> navigate to Page_integrations
step 5: At Page_integrations click on hyperlink_agent --> navigate to Page_agent
step 6: At Page_agent click on hyperlink_test_environment_installation --> navigate to Page_test-environment-installation
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page_test-environment-installation
